title: 332. Why the Trump Tax Cuts Are Terrible/Awesome (Part 2)
description: Three former White House economists weigh in on the new tax bill. A sample: "The overwhelming evidence is that the trickle-down, magic-beanstalk beans argument — that's just nonsense."
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
